Name: Dolores No. 2
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
30 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Dolores No. 2 contains 258 calories
